entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the evening and overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
